  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86861</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Acid, neutral, or alkali substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säure, Neutrales oder Alkalisubstanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acide, point mort, ou substances d'alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ácido, ponto morto, ou substâncias do 
alcalóide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acido, neutrale, o sostanze dell'alcali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όξινες, ουδέτερες, ή αλκαλικές ουσίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ácido, hilo neutro, o sustancias del álcali</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">this diagram illustrates that substances on the left side of neutral substances are considered acids and on the right side are considered alkalis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pH</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß Substanzen 
auf der linken Seite der Nullsubstanzen als Säuren gelten und auf der
rechten Seite als Alkalien gelten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ce diagramme illustre que des substances du 
côté gauche des substances neutres sont considérées des acides et 
du bon côté sont considérés des alcalis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">este diagrama ilustra que as substâncias no lado 
esquerdo de substâncias neutras estão consideradas ácidos e no lado
direito estão considerados alcalóides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">questo schema illustra che le sostanze dalla parte
di sinistra delle sostanze neutre sono considerate acidi e dalla parte
di destra sono considerati alcali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι οι ουσίες στην 
αριστερή πλευρά των ουδέτερων ουσιών θεωρούνται οξέα και στη 
σωστή πλευρά θεωρείται αλκάλια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">este diagrama ilustra que las sustancias en el 
lado izquierdo de sustancias neutrales están consideradas los ácidos
y en el derecho están considerados los álcalis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkalien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Null</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pH</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">acides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">alcalis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
